mapper.select: SELECT fcc.customer_id AS customerId, COUNT(DISTINCT fcc.order_id) AS completedQty FROM fi_customercharge fcc WHERE fcc.quarter = #{quarter} AND fcc.create_date >= #{beginDate} AND fcc.create_date < #{endDate} AND fcc.charge_order_type = 0 AND fcc.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000

SELECT soc.customer_id AS customerId, COUNT(soc.order_id) AS returnedQty FROM sd_order_condition soc WHERE soc.status = 90 AND soc.close_date >= #{beginDate} AND soc.close_date < #{endDate} GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000

SELECT soc.customer_id AS customerId, COUNT(soc.order_id) AS cancelledQty FROM sd_order_condition soc WHERE soc.status = 100 AND soc.close_date >= #{beginDate} AND soc.close_date < #{endDate} GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000

SELECT soc.customer_id AS customerId, COUNT(soc.order_id) AS uncompletedQty FROM sd_order_condition soc INNER JOIN sd_order_status sos ON sos.order_id = soc.order_id WHERE soc.create_date < #{endDate} AND (sos.cancel_approve_date IS NULL OR sos.cancel_approve_date > #{endDate}) AND (sos.charge_date IS NULL OR sos.charge_date > #{endDate}) GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000

SELECT COUNT(soc.order_id) AS uncompletedQty FROM sd_order_condition soc INNER JOIN sd_order_status sos ON sos.order_id = soc.order_id WHERE soc.customer_id = #{customerId} AND soc.create_date < #{endDate} AND (sos.cancel_approve_date IS NULL OR sos.cancel_approve_date > #{endDate}) AND (sos.charge_date IS NULL OR sos.charge_date > #{endDate})

SELECT fcc.customer_id AS customerId, SUM(fcc.amount) AS rechargeAmount FROM fi_customercurrency fcc WHERE fcc.quarter = #{quarter} AND fcc.create_date >= #{beginDate} AND fcc.create_date < #{endDate} AND fcc.action_type <= 20 GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000

SELECT fcc.customer_id AS customerId, SUM(fcc.service_charge+fcc.express_charge+fcc.travel_charge+fcc.material_charge+fcc.other_charge) AS completedOrderCharge, SUM(fcc.time_liness_charge) AS timelinessCharge, SUM(fcc.urgent_charge) AS urgentCharge FROM fi_customercharge fcc WHERE fcc.quarter = #{quarter} AND fcc.create_date >= #{beginDate} AND fcc.create_date < #{endDate} AND fcc.charge_order_type = 0 AND fcc.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000

SELECT fcc.customer_id AS customerId, SUM(fcc.service_charge+fcc.express_charge+fcc.travel_charge+fcc.material_charge+fcc.other_charge) AS writeOffCharge FROM fi_customercharge fcc WHERE fcc.quarter = #{quarter} AND fcc.create_date >= #{beginDate} AND fcc.create_date < #{endDate} AND fcc.charge_order_type = 1 AND fcc.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000

SELECT fcc.customer_id AS customerId, SUM(fcc.amount) AS balance FROM fi_customercurrency fcc WHERE fcc.action_type >= 10 AND fcc.action_type <= 50 AND fcc.create_date < #{endDate} GROUP BY customerId LIMIT 10000
